title: When is the best time to play LOL
body: my experience is that i have better games late at night i rarely get afks but during the day i see them in alot more games,any one else know of good times to play that makes the game better for them?

replies.body: Play lol during school hours or late in the night. Avoids dem rebel teens
yea i tend to win more game l8 at night but during school hours sounds good, when im not working i can do that then XD

I'm a teen, but I'm not toxic :P
But yeah, play during school hours, and during weekends, play during the afternoon.
During weekdays, play during the morning / night.
During Friday in particular well don't go into Ranked... Just do normals :P
I climbed out of bronze 5 playing exclusively during day time. From when queue opens to around 4pm.
Thats complete opposite for me. I notice as soon as school is out or on the weekend the players get worse.
